summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ML Job Submission Platform. All backend APIs (11/11 tests) and frontend functionality working correctly. Successfully tested job submission, dashboard display, stats cards, navigation, validation, advanced options, and job deletion.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
Job creation with all required fields (model_name, datasize, workload_type, duration, budget)
Job creation with advanced options (precision, framework)
Form validation for missing required fields
Form validation for invalid workload types
Jobs API returns all jobs sorted by creation date (newest first)
Job status updates via PATCH endpoint
Error handling for non-existent jobs (404 responses)
Dashboard loads and displays stats cards correctly
Navigation between dashboard and submit form
Job submission form validation and submission
Real-time job display on dashboard after submission
Job deletion from dashboard with confirmation
